items.title: Hindalco subsidiary Novelis working to mitigate tariff headwinds, expects resilient demand for aluminium
items.description: Novelis added that it is looking to accelerate cost reduction steps, which can drive higher cost savings in FY26, and over $300 million by end of FY28.

items.title: Taking Stock: Bulls powers Nifty above 24,550, Sensex up 0.9 percent in broad-based rebound
items.description: Nearly 120 stocks touched their 52-week highs on the BSE, including Sai Life Sciences, Paytm, Indian Bank, Fortis Healthcare, Nuvoco Vistas, Delhivery, eClerx Services, among others.

items.title: Nifty Stages Solid Rebound Amid All-Round Buying; Autos, PSU Banks Lead| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Market stages solid comeback. Nifty recovers nearly 200 points from day's low. Nifty reclaims 24,500 amid all-round buying. Autos, PSU banks lead from the front. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar

items.title: Data Patterns, Mazagon Dock, other defence shares rise up to 4.5% after three-session fall: Here are 5 key reasons
items.description: Defence stocks: The sharp rise in the share prices pushed the Nifty Defence index up nearly 1.3%

items.title: Buy State Bank of India; target of Rs 908: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research is bullish on State Bank of India has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 908 in its research report dated August 11, 2025.
